main event: A civilian reported sighting a brilliant white light with pink extremes in Pleasant Valley, Ohio on March 6, 1968.
interesting points: The observation lasted 4 to 5 minutes,The object was seen moving from west to east,The witness refused to complete a follow-up form requested by the Air Force,The report mentions numerous unidentified sightings in the Dayton area,The object appeared to be solid with variable sound.
sighted object: brilliant white light with pink extremes
